title: @Riot Mirkinan: Can we get an update on 24/7 ranked please <3
body:
You said you would go over the stats to see the activity numbers during the ranked queues being open by mistake to confirm what all the players were telling you, that the queue times were fine and it was worth the minor delay in queue times to play ranked at that hour.

 WTB 24/7 ranked on OCE, was one of the things I miss about playing on NA.
